node.content-desc: Version 2.4.7
Some improvements to the language files (typos etc).
Some improvements to the language files (typos etc).
Version 2.4.6
Might have fixed sound stopping issue.
Might have fixed sound stopping issue.
Data should never be lost; if you find this happens then please email to assist in debugging.
Data should never be lost; if you find this happens then please email to assist in debugging.
Version 2.4.5
Fixed a potential crashing bug.
Fixed a potential crashing bug.
Version 2.4.4
Added permissions request for setting background images.
Added permissions request for setting background images.
Version 2.4.3
Bugfix for database exporting.
Bugfix for database exporting.
Version 2.4.2
Request storage permission for Android 6.0.
Request storage permission for Android 6.0.
Allow moving to SD card.
Allow moving to SD card.
Included German translation.
Included German translation.
Version 2.4.1
Version 2.4.0
Projects can now be cloned.
Projects can now be cloned.
Version 2.3.9
Optional sound on + or - button press.
Optional sound on + or - button press.
Version 2.3.8
Bugfix for saving alert sound.
Bugfix for saving alert sound.
Version 2.3.7-r2
Another fix for a bug on android 4.0.4 and below.
Another fix for a bug on android 4.0.4 and below.
Version 2.3.7-r1
Fix for small bug on android 4.0.4 and below.
Fix for small bug on android 4.0.4 and below.
Version 2.3.7
Optional count multiplier option added (off by default).
Optional count multiplier option added (off by default).
Fiddled with count sizes to try to prevent line wrapping.
Fiddled with count sizes to try to prevent line wrapping.
Fixed database upgrade bug.
Fixed database upgrade bug.
Version 2.3.6
Switch focus to text box when adding a count to a new project.
Switch focus to text box when adding a count to a new project.
Added a settings option to disable the requirement for unique count names in a project.
Added a settings option to disable the requirement for unique count names in a project.
Version 2.3.5
Redirect to project list after project creation.
Redirect to project list after project creation.
Version 2.3.4
Alerts will now trigger for a count which is set to zero (bugfix).
Alerts will now trigger for a count which is set to zero (bugfix).
Some spurious link warnings should no longer appear.
Some spurious link warnings should no longer appear.
Version 2.3.3
Project notes can now be shared, allowing them to be exported.
Project notes can now be shared, allowing them to be exported.
Version 2.3.2
A bug affecting drop-down menus when adding new links has been fixed.
A bug affecting drop-down menus when adding new links has been fixed.
A small safeguard against recursive linking has been added (this will get more attention in future).
A small safeguard against recursive linking has been added (this will get more attention in future).
Version 2.3.1
A new setting allows alerts to also make a sound when triggered.
A new setting allows alerts to also make a sound when triggered.
Some small bugfixes have been added.
Some small bugfixes have been added.
Version 2.3.0
Basic increase/decrease calculation has been added. Please refer to the linked pdf for more information.
Basic increase/decrease calculation has been added. Please refer to the linked pdf for more information.
Version 2.2.0
Counts can now have individual notes, in addition to the overall project notes.
Counts can now have individual notes, in addition to the overall project notes.
Version 2.1.0
Fixed a bug where elements would disappear from some screens on device rotation.
Fixed a bug where elements would disappear from some screens on device rotation.
Added an option to increase the font size of project notes on the counting screen.
Added an option to increase the font size of project notes on the counting screen.
Added an option to change the sort order of projects on the project list screen.
Added an option to change the sort order of projects on the project list screen.
Version 2.0.10
Fix for a crash caused by deleting linked counts.
Fix for a crash caused by deleting linked counts.
Version 2.0.9
Linked counts should now auto-reset properly.
Linked counts should now auto-reset properly.
Version 2.0.8
The font size now changes when counting to accommodate counts greater than 99.
The font size now changes when counting to accommodate counts greater than 99.
Version 2.0.7
Additional action bar buttons have been added.
Additional action bar buttons have been added.
Version 2.0.6
Improved stability when resuming from pause.
Improved stability when resuming from pause.
Version 2.0.5
Various small bugfixes.
Various small bugfixes.
Version 2.0.4
The plus and minus signs on the count buttons have been made clearer.
The plus and minus signs on the count buttons have been made clearer.
Fixed missing save button on count options landscape layout.
Fixed missing save button on count options landscape layout.
Version 2.0.3
The delete button for projects has been added back and should now work properly.
The delete button for projects has been added back and should now work properly.
Version 2.0.2
A preliminary French translation has been added.
A preliminary French translation has been added.
A small background image error on the welcome screen has been fixed.
A small background image error on the welcome screen has been fixed.
A crash bug when setting a background image has been addressed.
A crash bug when setting a background image has been addressed.
Project deletion has revered back to long-pressing a row, for now (apologies).
Project deletion has revered back to long-pressing a row, for now (apologies).
Version 2.0.1
Please back up your data before proceeding! The export option from the menu above can be used for this purpose.
Projects can now be deleted with a button rather than a long press.
Projects can now be deleted with a button rather than a long press.
Some links can't be imported, but BeeCount will no longer crash if this happens.
Some links can't be imported, but BeeCount will no longer crash if this happens.
Version 2.0.0
BeeCount 2.0!
Multiple alerts and tablet layouts added.
Multiple alerts and tablet layouts added.
Various other UI improvements.
Various other UI improvements.
Much code refactoring to make maintenance and further development easier.
Much code refactoring to make maintenance and further development easier.
